name: Two Gather
description:
ZD or arrow keys for movement. Space for Jump. 

Game for the NO-CRUNCH Game Jam 2020 / Theme : Empathy

Héloïse BOURSIER : Game Design, Level Design

Jérémy BOR : Programming

Josy VOYANCE : Music Composer, Sound Designer

Marie CATTANI : Narration

Marie LOURME : Graphics
